p: For the Anti- Trichomonas vaginalis activity assay, statistical analysis was conducted using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA), and a probability value of p < 0.05 was considered significant. Tukeyâ€™s test was utilized to identify significant differences between the means of different treatments. GraphPad Prism version 5.0 for Windows (GraphPad Software, USA) was used for statistical analysis.
